name: inverse uniqueness
description: Prove the theorem that in a group, inverses are unique

name: identity uniqueness with syntax trees
description: Prove that the identity element in a group is unique using syntax trees

name: inverse product rule
description: Prove that in a group, (ab)⁻¹ = b⁻¹a⁻¹

name: abelian squared criterion
description: Prove that a group is abelian if and only if (ab)² = a²b² for all a,b in the group

name: lagrange theorem
description:
Prove Lagrange's Theorem: If H is a subgroup of a finite group G,
then the order of H divides the order of G
